pages.text: Cervalces Latifrons wander the taigas and swamps of the Overworld. If TFC is installed, you can find Cervalces Latifrons alongside Deer. $(br2)Cervalces Latifrons can be tamed much like horses and can have saddles and chests.

When tamed, they can carry one player. $(br2)Be careful, as they'll attack players on-sight. Tame them as fast as possible! $(br2)Cervalces Latifrons enjoy: $(br2)Seagrass, Carrots, and (TFC)Blueberries.
